localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Your Week is a simple weekly planner that I built to help me plan my priorities at the start of the week. It has a clear week-based layout and provides a helpful reminder to plan each week. Try it at https://yourweek.app or get the Android app.
blogPost.body: Your Week is a simple weekly planner that I built to help me plan my priorities at the start of the week. It has a clear week-based layout and provides a helpful reminder to plan each week. Try it at https://yourweek.app or get the Android app.
blogPost.title: Your Week - Hold yourself accountable to weekly goals and priorities.
blogPost.author: Graham Macphee

localize.description: 你的一周是一个简单的每周计划器，我创建它是为了帮助我在一周开始时计划我的优先事项。它有一个清晰的以周为基础的布局，并提供了一个有用的提醒，以每周计划。在https://yourweek.app上试试，或者获取安卓应用程序。
localize.tagline: 让自己对每周的目标和优先事项负责。

localize.description: 你的一週是一個簡單的每週計劃器，我創建它是爲了幫助我在一週開始時計劃我的優先事項。它有一個清晰的以周爲基礎的佈局，並提供了一個有用的提醒，以每週計劃。在https://yourweek.app上試試，或者獲取安卓應用程序。
localize.tagline: 讓自己對每週的目標和優先事項負責。

previous.excerpt: PetCloud's Pet Taxi Service can drive Pets to and from Vets, Grooming Appointments, to a Pet Sitters house, or to your Wedding Venue. No need to accompany them.
previous.title: PetCloud's Pet Taxi - Safe drivers to take your pets to appointments

localize.description: PetCloud的宠物出租车服务可以接送宠物往返于宠物、美容预约、宠物之家或您的婚礼场地。不需要陪着他们。
localize.tagline: 安全的司机带你的宠物去约会

localize.description: PetCloud的寵物出租車服務可以接送寵物往返於寵物、美容預約、寵物之家或您的婚禮場地。不需要陪着他們。
localize.tagline: 安全的司機帶你的寵物去約會
